localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: With Birabo, you will never lose your project files, notes, folders and links again. Share them with your team in one workspace, in real-time.
nodes.title: Birabo - An effortless real-time collaboration tool for teams
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Hijack Your Feed is a Safari extenion that replaces Twitter ads with your todos. It creates eye-catching posts based on your Reminders, which are then hijacked into your Twitter feed. Designed to nudge you toward your intentionsâ€¦ and away from doom-scrolling.
nodes.title: Hijack Your Feed - Replace Twitter ads with your todos
nodes.author: Rodolfo Rosini

nodes.excerpt: Personal journal app for everyone where you can get connected with others! Goodnight Journal is the only personal journal app that offers modern design that works the same on any device, with the community, chat and features to boost your mental health.
nodes.title: Goodnight Journal 2.0 - Facebook for journaling
nodes.author: Arman

nodes.excerpt: Textcraft is a magical utility for iPhone, iPad, and Mac that allows you to transform any text in real-time into a variety of 80+ different formats.
nodes.title: Textcraft - Magic text transformations
nodes.author: JPEGuin

nodes.excerpt: Transcribe your YouTube video in one click and highlight the important stuff for easy and quick reading. you-tldr let's you skim through the video transcript and skip to the good stuff. You can also download the transcript for your records.
nodes.title: you-tldr - Get the tldr of any YouTube video in seconds
nodes.author: Bilal Tahir

nodes.excerpt: Itâ€™s a fun & easy solution for you and your friends to find the best movie or TV-show to watch on Netflix. Swipe through media name cards. If all your friends like the same movie, it's a match! Less scrolling more watching
nodes.title: Couchers - Less scrolling more watching.
nodes.author: Ali Raza Noorani

nodes.excerpt: Access your favourite Websites and Web Apps easily and quickly. Save the websites addresses and give them a custom name and icon, then easily access them from the Menu Bar or in an Always-on-Top window. Freely resize the menu window for a better experience
nodes.title: Surf - Access any website or web app from menu bar/floating window
nodes.author: Lucian Boiangiu

nodes.excerpt: A different way to organize your To-Do List or view iOS Reminders. A better tasks widget for your homescreen. Prioritize your to-do list with the weekly monthly yearly tasks planner app. Now with optional Reminders Sync, homescreen widgets, and iCloud backup.
nodes.title: Strongweek - Organise your To-Do list & reminders
nodes.author: Chris

nodes.excerpt: Budg is a tool to easily track your subscriptions (aka recurring expenses).
nodes.title: Budg - The tool you need to track your subscriptions
nodes.author: Matthieu H.

nodes.excerpt: When you read an email you will see a numerical score just below the subjectâ€“a score between 0 and 100. A score of 100 means the email is very easy to read and a score of 0 means the email is very difficult to read.
nodes.title: Gmail inbox Readability Score - Calculating the readability score of an email
nodes.author: Argyrou Argyris

nodes.excerpt: Findnlink is a platform where you can share your projects and find co-founders/members. - Customize your project page - Create your own portfolio / profile - Show your skills We want to make Findnlink a great virtual workspace to connect teams together ğŸ‘Œ
nodes.title: Findnlink - Find people to work with on your ideas.
nodes.author: Emil Hopf

nodes.excerpt: Invoicer is a document based invoice maker app available exclusively on iOS/iPadOS/macOS platforms. All your invoice files and preferences are stored in iCloud so you can work seemlessly across different devices without the need to create an account for syncing.
nodes.title: Invoicer - Document based invoice maker app for iOS/iPadOS/macOS
nodes.author: Alex

nodes.excerpt: Being productive is hard. Success is based on prioritized task lists and the Pomodoro Technique. Plan your week, set your daily tasks, and reflect on the past days to reach all your goals.
nodes.title: Success Planner - Minimalist iOS/Android app to track daily tasks
nodes.author: Arnaud

nodes.excerpt: Confetti is a colorful habit tracker that tracks your daily/weekly habits & to-dos and launches confetti for every completion to celebrate your daily accomplishments. Confetti also makes it easy to visualize your progress over time with in-depth stats.
nodes.title: Confetti iOS + Android - Develop good habits and eliminate bad ones
nodes.author: Danny Sapio

nodes.excerpt: Create and customize minimally generated patterns or artwork to use for wall art, background images, print and other projects. Download your high-resolution art for free. Start making your art at https://tabbied.com
nodes.title: Tabbied - Doodle with generated patterns
nodes.author: Sy Hong

nodes.excerpt: Elza browser is not a replacement for your web browser but a powerful tool when you would like to keep your browsing private. Elza is always on incognito with an option to turn on Tor which runs much faster than even the Tor Browser. #Minimal #Fast #Private
nodes.title: Elza Browser - Fast, private, and minimal web browser.
nodes.author: Nitin Sudhakar

nodes.excerpt: Make Writing a Habit. Write for at least 10 minutes a day for the next 90 days. Tweet your progress each day with the #90DaysOfProse hashtag.
nodes.title: #90DaysOfProse - Make writing a habit
nodes.author: Daniel K. Hunter

nodes.excerpt: For anyone wanting to improve their wellness and achieve their goals, the HistoricalMe app is your private, online space that makes it simple to record and track all elements of your daily life. Find out more about you with this diary app in 2021.
nodes.title: HistoricalMe - Diarise, organise and realise.
nodes.author: John Kellett

nodes.excerpt: Record Screen or Webcam and Share instantly. No need to install any application. Just super fast recording and share. Live Streaming Feature to be added very soon. Super fast recordings to give feedback to your team, education, creating product demos.
nodes.title: Record Webcam + Screen > Share - Simple Screen + Webcam Recording. Share after recording
nodes.author: Hammad Akbar

nodes.excerpt: A simple application that allows you to generate various copy with just a prompt. Its use ranges from summarizing long text, answering questions, completing thoughts and writing articles. The tool is powered completed by OpenAI's GPT-3 algorithm.
nodes.title: Virtual Ghost Writer - AI copy writer powered by OpenAI
nodes.author: Stephen Campbell

nodes.excerpt: Privacy policies and data request forms SHOULD be easy to find, but many companies hide them deep in their UI. Privacy hunt is a simple, free, crowd-sourced repository to reduce that to 1 click! ğŸ˜ Find a company, click on the link, and reclaim YOUR data. ğŸ™Œ
nodes.title: Privacy Hunt - We hunt data request forms, so you can reclaim YOUR data.
nodes.author: Robert Thelen

nodes.excerpt: Culturely empowers your people with better culture to improve performance and enhance organizational growth. It also brings managers and employees together using ğŸ¯ OKRs, ğŸ­ 1:1 Meetings and other best-in-class tools.
nodes.title: Culturely - All-in-one people engagement platform

nodes.excerpt: Write in Notion, publish to the web. Add custom domain, analytics, themes and more.
nodes.title: Notelet - Create a website or blog with Notion.
nodes.author: Tem Nugmanov

nodes.excerpt: Simple Calendar is a calendar that gives you more clarity and efficiency. Choose from 10 different styles of your choice today.
nodes.title: 2021 Simple Calendar - Calendar for more clarity and efficiency
nodes.author: Dissolvent

nodes.excerpt: Turn your browser bookmarks into embedded cards and watch YouTube/Vimeo videos, listen to audio, see images, read articles and more right from one dashboard. Now offers : â€¢ Nested folders â€¢ Link shortener â€¢ Saving links as PDF â€¢ Highlighting text on web
